channel.title: 2 errors..trying to change max lvl for admins/owners only

item.title: 2 errors..trying to change max lvl for admins/owners only
item.dc:creator: @skeebo skeebo
item.description:
@skeebo wrote:

[quote=“zubmage, post:10, topic:202431”]Replace code with:

[code] public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

    for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 115; lvl++) {
        points += Math.floor(
                (double) lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
        output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
        if (output >= exp) {
            return lvl;
        }
    }
    return 115;
}
}   else if (playerRights >= 2) {
    for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 255; lvl++) {
        points += Math.floor(
                (double) lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
        output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
        if (output >= exp) {
            return lvl;
        }
    }
    return 255;
}[/code][/quote]

got these errors again…

client.java:13012: illegal sttart of type } else if (playerRights >= 2) { ^ client.java:13012: <identifier> expected } else if (playerRights >= 2 { ^ 2 errors Server Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue...

Read full topic

item.title: 2 errors..trying to change max lvl for admins/owners only
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

Replace code with:

[code] public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

    for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 115; lvl++) {
        points += Math.floor(
                (double) lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
        output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
        if (output >= exp) {
            return lvl;
        }
    }
    return 115;
}
}   else if (playerRights >= 2) {
    for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 255; lvl++) {
        points += Math.floor(
                (double) lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
        output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
        if (output >= exp) {
            return lvl;
        }
    }
    return 255;
}[/code]

item.title: 2 errors..trying to change max lvl for admins/owners only
item.dc:creator: @skeebo skeebo
item.description:
@skeebo wrote:

dude hey graham sucks you got banned, anyways that brings up liek 6 errors including ‘else’ without ‘if’ and so i take else out and i need to add a bracket then it goes back to the unreachable thing again -.-

you can try to figure it out if you want…add this:

if (playerRights >= 2); for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 255; lvl++) { points += Math.floor( (double) lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0)); output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 255; }

here: public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 28, 2008, 10:17:39 PM[/size][hr]i have to go -.- i hope you can figure it out. i’ll check back tomorow, thanks for all the attempted help

item.description:
@This_is_not_an_Alt_P wrote:

try putting

else if (playerRights >= 2); for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 255; lvl++) { points += Math.floor( (double) lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0)); output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 255; }
or

} else if (playerRights >= 2) { for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 255; lvl++) { points += Math.floor( (double) lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0)); output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 255; }

item.title: 2 errors..trying to change max lvl for admins/owners only
item.dc:creator: @r3d_th3m3 r3d_th3m3
item.description:
@r3d_th3m3 wrote:

I think he means like

    } else {
 if (playerRights >= 2);
        for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 255; lvl++) {
            points += Math.floor(
                    (double) lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
            output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
            if (output >= exp) {
                return lvl;
            }
        }
        return 255;
    }

I’m pretty sure thats how it goes.

item.title: 2 errors..trying to change max lvl for admins/owners only
item.dc:creator: @skeebo skeebo
item.description:
@skeebo wrote:

umm…help please?

my code

[code] public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

    for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 115; lvl++) {
        points += Math.floor(
                (double) lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
        output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
        if (output >= exp) {
            return lvl;
        }
    }
    return 115;
}   else if (playerRights >= 2) {
    for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 255; lvl++) {
        points += Math.floor(
                (double) lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
        output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
        if (output >= exp) {
            return lvl;
        }
    }
    return 255;
}[/code]

my error

client.java:13012: illegal sttart of type } else if (playerRights >= 2) { ^ client.java:13012: <identifier> expected } else if (playerRights >= 2 { ^ 2 errors Server Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue...

any ideas?
